QuestData.Title: Restoring Jade's Purity
QuestData.Description: $C, will you aid us?$B$BThe temple's purity has been jeopardized. Even now the three masters struggle against their doubts.$B$BPlease, I beg you, head in and help Wise Mari, Liu Flameheart, and Lorewalker Stonestep in their fight against the sha.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assist Wise Mari, Liu Flameheart, and Lorewalker Stonestep with their sha problems.
